body:
Ok, John, you gave me an idea, why not have all warning message strings
replaced by some http-requests piping this mailing list's archives to
STDERR? It is not wearable though :-(

Cheers, Lars.
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Can't get gensky to work without sun...
subject: [Radiance-general] Can't get gensky to work without sun...
